SamPy.astronomy.conversions.degTohms¶

SamPy.astronomy.conversions.degTohms(ideg)¶

Converts degrees to hours:minutes:seconds

Parameters:
  • ideg (float) – objects coordinates in degrees
Returns:

hours:minutes:seconds
Return type:

string
